definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

pinyin: Wu1 zi1 bie2 ke4 si1 tan3

sentences.english: The Uzbek soldiers claimed mercy from Genghis Khan.
sentences.chinese: 這些烏茲別克士兵祈求成吉思汗的寬恕。

sentences.english: Uzbekistan has reached the last eight of the Asian Cup for the third time, while China was eliminated.
sentences.chinese: 至此，烏茲別克三進八強，而中國隊遭小組出局。

sentences.english: Uzbeks are among the most orthodox of the Central Asian peoples.
sentences.chinese: 烏茲別克人是中亞最傳統的民族。

sentences.english: He held solo exhibition in Uzbekistan in 1997.
sentences.chinese: 1997年在烏茲別克布哈拉舉辦個展。

sentences.english: Mural on the side of a building depicting various types of Uzbke military men.
sentences.chinese: 某建築物牆上的壁畫，繪製着各式烏茲別克軍人。

sentences.english: I moved to Uzbekistan to work as a freelancer.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我搬到了烏茲別克，成爲了一名自由職業者。

sentences.english: The classical music is shashmaqam, which is very similar to Uzbek music.
sentences.chinese: 民族音樂是沙什馬貢，類似於烏茲別克音樂。

sentences.english: Local sources said the dead included Arabs and Uzbeks.
sentences.chinese: 當地消息稱死者中有阿拉伯人和烏茲別克人。

definition: to mess sth up/to screw up
Rostov-on-Don, Russian river port and regional capital close to Sea of Azov (north of the Black Sea)
Vanuatu, country in the southwestern Pacific Ocean

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

definition: Moldova/Republic of Moldova, former Soviet republic on the border with Romania
lit. to win a victory on raising the flag (idiom); fig. to start on sth and have immediate success/success in a single move

pinyin: Ma3 si1 te4 li3 he4 te4
Ji2 er3 ji2 si1 si1 tan3
